# Zack Bashirtash

## ![a man smiling for the camera](https://content.civicplus.com/api/assets/9e561969-84b6-4119-8bd9-9228635fa8d4)Ward 6 Councilmember

**Term Expires:** November 2028  
**Phone:** 661-326-3767  
[Email Zack Bashirtash](mailto:City_Council@bakersfieldcity.us) or click here to [complete the contact form below](https://www.bakersfieldcity.us/507/Patty-Gray/)

1600 Truxtun Avenue  
Bakersfield, CA 93301
